variant.question: You are in a piston A/c and the carburetor catches fire AFTER start. Your actions are

options.text: Carry out the engine fire on the ground drills immediately
Select mixture OFF, open throttle and use extinguisher
Leave the engine running and check to see if the fire continues
Select mixture to OFF and vacate the a/c immediately

variant.question: List the actions to be taken in the event of a carburettor fire in a piston-engined aircraft during start, if the engine has already started.

options.text: Allow the engine to run and monitor. If the fire continues, perform the engine fire on ground checklist.
Mixture – idle cut-off, Throttle – full open, Fuel selector - OFF, Fire extinguisher – discharge.
Mixture – idle cut-off, evacuate the aircraft.
Mixture – idle cut-off, Throttle – full open, Fire extinguisher – discharge.

variant.question: List the actions to be taken in the event of a carburettor fire in piston-engined aircraft during start-up, when the engine has started?

options.text: Mixture – idle cut-off, Throttle – full open, Fuel selector - OFF
Mixture - idle cut-off, Throttle – full open, Operate the engine extinguisher
Carry out the engine fire on the ground checklist
Immediately inform ATC of the situation
